full_threads.body: @rica +30mins please then ok to close. Cheers

Hi Jatin,

I have looked at the previous SPF record and it was failing. It looked like someone had put in some spamming senders etc. I have updated it to support the Google GSuite servers and mail sent from the website.

Have a look at the attached before and afters, you will see it was failing and now passes.

Let me know how it goes? Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

On 5 Jul 2021, at 12:56 pm, Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:

Dear Heath

Microsoft 365 admin account issue has been resolved. Thanks for that.

Can you please look into the SPF record issue, We still can not send an email to some customers. If you want we can discuss over the phone.
Please let me know about this one as we really need to solve it ASAP.

Regards,
Jatin Vamja
Inventory Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Mon, Jun 28, 2021 at 1:15 PM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Jatin,

Please note, I had to update the password as well, so it is now:

Dura@123

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 28 Jun 2021, at 12:12 pm, Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:

Hello Heath

Micorosoft 365 login credentials
Email - accounts@duracube.com.au
Password - Dura@123

I think you have login credentials for cloudflare. In cloudflare I have created a TXT record as per my understanding. I hope you will understand but still you want to double check let me know.

Please also look for the SPF record because still we can not send an email to some customers.


Regards,
Jatin Vamja
Inventory Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Mon, Jun 28, 2021 at 11:59 AM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Jatin,

I have looked into this for you. The records on the domain name duracube.com.au are incorrect and currently use Google servers.

Can you please send through the Office 365 logins. I should be able to configure them for you.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 28 Jun 2021, at 10:19 am, Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:

Good Morning Heath

Can you please fix this issue for me?

Currently we are facing so many issues that we need to solved it ASAP.

Regards,
Jatin Vamja
Inventory Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Fri, Jun 25, 2021 at 9:17 AM Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:
Hello Heath

At the moment we have 2 issues. Let me try to explain. I am not a network engineer so please understand accordingly.

1st issue - We have some customers that we can not send an email from the duracube.com.au domain. We get error message like message not delivered - The response from the remote server was:

550 #5.7.1 SPF unauthorized mail is prohibited. But, when I try to send an email from my personal gmail account it works fine.


2nd issue - We want to set up a microsoft 365 admin account for accounts@duracube.com.au. But as per microsoft 365 we have to set up a domain register and TXT or MX record set up. I am not sure what these are but I followed instructions given by microsoft but it did not work. As per my research I think there is something wrong with the name server in the domain register. Name server detail I sent you in a previous email.

Let me know if you want Microsoft 365 login credentials or anything else.

Please find the attachment of email delivery failure.


Regards,
Jatin Vamja
Inventory & Purchase Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Fri, Jun 25, 2021 at 8:42 AM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Jatin,

The name servers are working perfectly.

What is the issue you are trying to fix with the SPF record? This will help me to advise accordingly.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 25 Jun 2021, at 8:37 am, Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:

Good morning Heath

I am not sure what the SPF value should be but I believe if you set up the correct name server for us it will solve our problems.

Please correct me if I am wrong. If things are not clear let me know if you are available we can discuss over a call. Find name server detail in attachment as per cloudflare

Regards,
Jatin Vamja
Inventory Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Wed, Jun 23, 2021 at 1:03 PM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Jatin,

Sure we can add the SPF record for you. Below is the current value FYI:

v=spf1 a mx a:ws4.yig-hosting.com a:yourhostedexchange.com a:mschosting.biz include:yourhostedexchange.net include:mschosting.biz include:spf.intermedia.net include:_spf.servercontrol.com.au include:servers.mcsv.net ~all

Let me know what you would like it to be instead?

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 23 Jun 2021, at 12:22 pm, Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:

Hello Heath

I am trying to set SPF records and TXT records for our domain duracube.com.au. But I don't have login details for DNS providers.
I have already gone through a cloudflare account. But I think it is not cloudflare where we have registered our domain.

Can you please give me DNS provider credentials? If you can not give us username and password can you please set up records for us.

Please let me know if I am missing something.

Regards,
Jatin Vamja
IT Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Mon, May 31, 2021 at 9:30 AM Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:
Thanks Heath

Regards,
Jatin Vamja
IT Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403



On Mon, May 31, 2021 at 9:17 AM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Jatin,

They are under our wholesale account with CloudFlare, so I can't grant access. I can however make any updates you require.

Alternatively, you can setup a CloudFlare account, copy the DNS entries over and then grant us permission.

Let me know your preference? Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 31 May 2021, at 9:02 am, Jatin Vamja <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au> wrote:

Hello Heath

I am looking for a DNS provider for duracube.com.au.

Can you send me login credentials for the DNS provider?


Regards,
Jatin Vamja
IT Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228 Direct: 0247 089 403

Thanks Heath.

Jatin, could you please let Heath know what you're needing? Heath is our web designer.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

What does Jatin require? We may be able to help.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
